price: គឺជាការប្រោសប្រទាន និងជានៀកម៉ាត់ពីអល់ឡោះ។ ហើយអល់ឡោះមហាដឹង មហាគតិបណ្ឌិត។
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
